Articles.Content: Because sometimes when you're in the middle of a monsoon or sandstorm you gotta post something.
the weather is nice here, mostly clear skies except for a few clouds,
To hot, I need more ice lollies.
Imagine a monsoon, now think worse, with lightning.
So your having fun then?

A semblance of cloudy. Very peaceful.

I always thought that Texas was sunny to the point of causing droughts...
Rainy. Not rainy to you tropical people, but quite rainy for us up here.
Dry, warm and sunny. Very weird weather for Ireland and I can't enjoy it because of exams, typical bad luck.

Awful cool grey day. Horrible weather for June. Hope it clears up by Sunday, I have a family reunion that I *think* I'm getting dragged to.

Although, my mom has taken no for an answer before...
Well, it is +27 at day and +13 at night so I say pretty good up here!
Where I am it's around 30 degrees, Humid (as usual), quite pleasant (I love warm humid weather), grey sky, scattered rain.
19 C here, chances of thunderstorms. Overall its OK.
Raining and cloudy.

Very Nice Weather Here, i cant see i cloud, not so hot anymore its 9:21 PM (Or 21:21)

In Sweden
As I thought, it is now thundering a lot.
Nice ,and cool with clear skies ,and patches of clouds here in the bay area in California.

OK, this is getting worse. Just had a 5 sec blackout.

EDIT: Everything is OK, PC OK, it has calmed down now.

Edited June 7, 2013 by The Destroyer
It's a nice summer day, perfect for launching virtual rockets
Ah, a fellow triple digit-sufferer?

I quite enjoy these semi-warm summer days. Thank Jeb and the Gulf Stream for providing Fennoscandia with this climate. WeÃ‚Â´re at the same latitude as Canada, but have the summer climate of the Eastern Seaborad of the US. HAH!
Sadly, it ain't raining. Sunny, with only a few clouds.
As usual for British summer, it is raining.

Very cloudy with some light rain after 6 consecutive days of clear skies and sun. Typical unpredictable weather..............
